updated_cases.title: Validate Uploaing >16MB .zip file to cloud storage with  boundary with Private app and DLP Profile + alert
updated_cases.custom_preconds:
Features to be enabled
- LFS with data trickling
- clientlessNpa
- npa_support_dlp
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- User should be to create RTP policy with these parameters
            - Access method: Browser Access
            - Destination: Private app, and select Browser Access based APP for HTTP/HTTPS
            - Activity: Upload
            - profile: DLP Profile(any)
            - action: Allow
- Send Https traffic to match policy conditions. and traffic should be blocked
- Skope-it Alert should be create for matching policy for FormPost activity

updated_cases.title: Validate Http Download file >128MB, to hit the DLP Fallback Action as Block with the Private-app + DLP Profile
updated_cases.custom_preconds:
Features to be enabled
- LFS with data trickling
- clientlessNpa
- npa_support_dlp
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- User should be to create RTP policy with these parameters
            - Access method: Browser Access
            - Destination: Private app, and select Browser Access based APP for HTTP/HTTPS
            - Activity: Upload
            - profile: DLP Profile(any)
            - action: Allow
- Send Https traffic to match policy conditions. and should fall into fallback action
- Skope-it Alert should be create for matching policy for Upload activity
